properties.description: This data flow processes internet order blobs from the storage account to DW.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderid as integer,
		orderdate as string,
		customer as integer,
		product as integer,
		units as integer,
		billingaddress as string,
		remarks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrdersInputSource
source(output(
		customerid as integer,
		fullname as string,
		address as string,
		credit as integer,
		status as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
source(output(
		itemdiscount as short,
		productid as short,
		title as string,
		unitprice as short,
		unitsinstock as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> Products
source(output(
		CityId as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CapitalCities
OrdersInputSource, Customers join(customer == customerid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OrderAndCustomers
OrderAndCustomers, Products join(product == productid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OrdersCustomersProductsOutput
OrdersCustomersProductsOutput, CapitalCities join(address == CityName,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'right')~> OrderJoinedOutput
OrderJoinedOutput select(mapColumn(
		orderid,
		orderdate,
		units,
		billingaddress,
		fullname,
		customerlocation = address,
		credit,
		status,
		itemdiscount,
		title,
		unitprice,
		unitsinstock,
		region = Region
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColums
SelectedColums derive(orderamount = units * unitprice,
		discountamount = toInteger(units * unitprice * itemdiscount * 0.01),
		customertype = iif(credit < 1000, "Silver", iif(credit >= 10000 && credit < 1000, "Gold", "Platinum")),
		activestatus = iif(status, "Active", "Inactive")) ~> PrepareColumns
PrepareColumns select(mapColumn(
		orderid,
		orderdate,
		units,
		billingaddress,
		fullname,
		customerlocation,
		title,
		unitprice,
		unitsinstock,
		region,
		orderamount,
		discountamount,
		customertype,
		activestatus,
		credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CleansedOrders
CleansedOrders filter(credit >= orderamount && unitsinstock >= units) ~> ProcessedOrders
ProcessedOrders sink(input(
		OrderId as integer,
		OrderDate as string,
		CustomerFullName as string,
		CustomerType as string,
		CustomerLocation as string,
		ProductTitle as string,
		Units as integer,
		UnitPrice as integer,
		Amount as integer,
		Discount as integer,
		Region as string,
		BillingAddress as string,
		ActiveStatus as string,
		UnitsInStock as integer,
		Credit as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		OrderId = orderid,
		OrderDate = orderdate,
		CustomerFullName = fullname,
		CustomerType = customertype,
		CustomerLocation = customerlocation,
		ProductTitle = title,
		Units = units,
		UnitPrice = unitprice,
		Amount = orderamount,
		Discount = discountamount,
		Region = region,
		BillingAddress = billingaddress,
		ActiveStatus = activestatus,
		UnitsInStock = unitsinstock,
		Credit = credit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> OutputToDW
